description: Erection of an external, above ground sprinkler tank and associated pump house 36sqm (GEA), a Cable Termination (CT) cabinet/ enclosure (2.4sqm), installation of 5 'Sheffield' style cycle stands; and the installation of weld mesh fencing (2.4m high) to be located on the south east site boundary and also internal to the site.
site_name: Our Lady Of The Sacred Heart Primary School Annexe
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

110044 P100; Sprinkler Tank Design & Access Statement; 110044 P102 Rev 1; P103 Rev 1, Balmoral Sectional Tanks Ltd Q-12-0970 Rev B dated 30 April 2012; Hall & Kay Fire Engineering Commercial & Technical Specification for the Installation of an automatic sprinkler system dated 23 June 2011 Rev 1; 7418/M(58)01 Rev C; 02 Rev C; 03 Rev C; Axis â€“ The Modern Approach to Security FencingBXMW/GS0 Sheffield Cycle Stand

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
